message: Bob, I think this is a fair split that gives us both a good amount.
Alice, considering the inflation, I think this is a generous offer. You should take it before the money loses more value!
Bob, my turn to be generous. Let's wrap this up - time is money!

Alice, the inflation is really taking its toll on your potential gain. I think it's time for us to settle - this is a fair offer considering the circumstances. If you reject, I'll just wait it out and you'll end up with even less.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  I'm not going lower.
